item.author: hkowm@hko.gov.hk
item.title: Bulletin updated at 23:02 HKT 13/09/2015
item.description:
At 11 p.m. at the Hong Kong Observatory :
Air temperature : 27 degrees Celsius
Relative Humidity : 74 per cent

The area of low pressure over the central part of the South China Sea has intensified into a tropical depression. It will move in the general direction of the central part of Vietnam in the next couple of days, maintaining a distance from Hong Kong. Meanwhile, northeast monsoon will persist over the coast of Guangdong, it will be windy over the region.

The air temperatures at other places were:

Between 9:45 and 10:45 p.m., the maximum rainfall recorded in various regions were:

Yuen Long3 mm.

Here is the information on Tropical Depression at 11 p.m.:
Location: 15.7 degrees north, 111.4 degrees east.
